dcterms:creator: Ignacio Arganda-Carreras
H. Sebastian Seung
Ashwin Vishwanathan
Daniel R. Berger
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of electron microscopy (EM) images to segment mouse cortex neurites in 3D. The dataset size is 100 × 1024 × 1024, and its 2D slices were used for 2D boundary segmentation experiments.
dcterms:title: SNEMI3D

dcterms:creator: Wei Liu
Jiahao Chen
Chuni Liu
Xiaojuan Ban
Boyuan Ma
Hao Wang
Weihua Xue
Yu Guo
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on pure iron grain segmentation in material science, comprising 296 microscopic slices with an image size of 1024 × 1024.
dcterms:title: Pure Iron Grain (IRON)

dcterms:creator: Volodymyr Mnih
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 1171 aerial images of Massachusetts, each with a size of 1500 × 1500 pixels, used for road segmentation.
dcterms:title: Massachusetts Roads Dataset (MASS. ROAD)
